item.title: Foldable iPhone's Thickness and Price Range Detailed in New Reports
item.description: Apple’s long-rumored foldable iPhone will likely have a starting price between $1,800 and $2,000 in the U.S., analysts at investment banking firm UBS said this week. If so, the foldable iPhone
